Text: Batthyány (] ) is the name of an old distinguished Hungarian Magnate family.
Triplets:<Batthyány
1:
--------------------
Text: Batthyány:  The members of this family bear the title count or countess (Graf/Gräfin) respectively prince or princess (Fürst/Fürstin) Batthyány von Német-Ujvár.
Triplets:<Batthyány
2:
--------------------
Text: Batthyány:  A branch of the family (Croatian: "Baćan" ) was notable in Croatia as well, producing several Bans (viceroys) of Croatia in the 16th, 17th and 18th century.
Triplets:<Batthyány
